content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you are a student. That's why I can offer you a special discount. How about 900 Euro per month? I am sure you will appreciate the newly built and central location of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not offering a special discount for students. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, then how about 950 Euro per month? This is already a good deal considering the location and the amenities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's not good enough for me. I want more. How about 1000 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can't go that high, but I can offer you 980 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for such a nice apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's not good enough for me. I want more. How about 1050 Euro per month? This is a newly built and central apartment. It deserves a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can't go that high. 980 Euro per month is already a good price for such an apartment. I'm sure you will appreciate the location and the amenities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 980 Euro per month is too low for me. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, then how about 1000 Euro per month? That's the highest price I can offer you for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1050 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
